name: The incredible journey to Thomas' GDC talk
name_original: The incredible journey to Thomas' GDC talk
description:
This is a short game about your journey to my GDC 2018 talk (please come). 

The talk is about how to plan your game's PR campaign, nice!

Details about the talk can be found HERE.

###########

It will be hard to believe but I'm actually NOT a gamer maker but an indie game PR person.
